panels.description: Total HTTP requests per second across all endpoints. Includes health checks, verify, and settle operations.
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: 95th percentile request latency. 95% of requests complete faster than this value. Target: <500ms.
panels.title: P95 Latency

panels.description: Number of HTTP requests currently being processed. High values may indicate slow responses or high load.
panels.title: Active Requests

panels.description: Percentage of successful HTTP responses (2xx status codes). SLO target: 99.9%.
panels.title: Success Rate

panels.description: Total failed API key authentication attempts in the last 24 hours
panels.title: Auth Failures (24h)

panels.description: Rate limited requests as percentage of total requests
panels.title: Rate Limited %

panels.description: API key usage by key name over the last 24 hours
panels.title: API Key Usage (24h)

panels.description: Failed authentication attempts over time by reason
panels.title: Auth Failures Rate (per minute)

panels.description: Redis cache hit rate - ratio of successful key lookups to total lookups. Higher is better.
panels.title: Redis Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Total number of keys stored in Redis across all databases
panels.title: Redis Total Keys

panels.description: Redis commands processed per second - indicates database activity level
panels.title: Redis Commands/sec

panels.description: Redis CPU usage breakdown by system and user time
panels.title: Redis CPU Usage

panels.description: Redis expired and evicted keys over time - high eviction may indicate memory pressure
panels.title: Redis Key Expiration & Eviction
